(I just want to clear up a few things up before posting:

1) The shields ARE up, though they won't last for long. The hole in the 
bridge has been sealed by plating due to the lockdown.

2) There are no defenses left. The majority, if not all of the autoguns have 
been destroyed, the EMP cannon is falling apart, and anything else you can 
think of has probably been blasted by the Alliance.

3) Hysteria, Smokescreen, and a few other Allinace 'bots are the only ones 
inside the CF. NO OTHER 'BOTS CAN ENTER OR EXIT UNLESS HYSTERIA DISENGAGES 
THE LOCKDOWN. You need the codes AND access to a console in order to 
disengage the lockdown, as far as I know anyway.

That's about it. If I forgot anything or overstepped my bounds please let me 
know. I hope this e-mail reaches everyone, oh, and Ks, I didn't read any new 
e-mails about Firestarter or Unitron firing inside the base, but e-groups 
may not have delivered them to me. The e-mail I recieved was the one were 
Smokescreen first appears and Unitron is talking about his horn missiles^_^ 
I apologize if this seems a little odd, but four hours of testing will do 
that to you>.< Hope you did better than I did on my tests Yan!)

Hysteria:

Hysteria finally stoppped fiddling with the shield's fluctuating power 
levels and starts concentrating on the CF's main entry way. She had been 
slowly collecting data on the horn missiles since she first discovered them 
burrowing deeper into the doors. They were weakening the molecular structure 
of the door, and seemed to be set to explode by a remote detonation:

"If I blast them they'll probably explode, and there's no way I can garuntee 
they won't take the shields with them."

Hysteria tapped a few keys on the larger console, still pondering the 
missiles that continued to burrow deeper into the door.
